name: Give and Take (purn)
description:
A game about strategizing with money. In the far future, people sell their own organs, to gain money for surviving. You, the surgeon that resells those organs, have only one goal, to earn 10 000 dollars in a spawn of few days, without killing 10 people in total. 

Every person offers you a part of their body. Thanks to their stats (price, illness, possibility of death), you can decide, if accepting their offer is favorable for your goal.

You control your decision by either pressing right arrow key for "yes", and left arrow key for "no". 

All assets were created during gamejam.

Game created by me, Richard Haraším and others amazing artists - Ela Giertlová and Daria Serebrianska. A three members team from the Czech Republic, Slovakia and Ukraine.

Of course, possible bugs are included!
